title: Intimidation
content:
Intimidation Main Attribute Charisma

Intimidation is a Skill in Baldur's Gate 3. Intimidation is a Charisma skill. Skills represent a specific aspect of an ability score, and an individual’s proficiency in a skill demonstrates a focus on that aspect.

Be a bully. Threaten and induce fear.

Intimidation Information

Intimidation is a Charisma Skill. When you attempt to influence someone through overt threats, hostile actions, and physical violence, the game can make a Charisma (Intimidation) check. Examples include trying to pry information out of a prisoner, convincing street thugs to back down from a confrontation, or using the edge of a broken bottle to convince a sneering vizier to reconsider a decision.
